The general approved.

Vorpal: Of course, but we need to see what kind of modus operandi it
can use with the most efficiency. 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightstrike:
> 
> Nightstrike said "Can I suggest a treacherous one?"
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Wednesday, September 28, 2005 8:27 AM
>   Subject: Re: Minions' base
> 
> 
>   The general had lost part of his enthusiasm, but not all.
> 
>   Vorpal: And yet... we now know that Rodimus is back, and so might our
>   former enemies. We must find a way to stop them, but we also know that
>   they are superior warriors when they want to be. We must find another
>   way...
